about_the_game:
HÜDDAM

It is an open world game that reflects Turkish culture.
It has a structure where you can engage in the act of researching and solving events.
This game, which is in the horror genre, will lead you to tension, fear and adventure while offering atmospheric environments.
You are a religious man, you are helpful.
So do you have the courage to solve things?

ENViRONMENT

Fantastic Places Mysterious Exciting Moments,
You Will Travel To Different Worlds.
You will pass through the dark realms and reach the center of hell.

SUBJECT

Ahmet Hodja, who has mastered the science of Havaş
As Hüddam, he clarified numerous cases
A girl named Zehra who is sick
During the henna night, she gets disturbed and closes herself in her room
Her family tells this situation to Ahmet Hoca
Hodja comes to the village and stays in the middle of a village abandoned by people
what the real hodja witnessed is more frightening than anything.

WARNİNG

The game contains blood and violence in hell scenes.
More horror theme is being handled.
Sound And Image Can Be Disturbing,
May Cause Sudden Visual Panic Attacks.

NOTE:

There is no anti-religious-blasphemy-sexuality-humiliation-and malicious intent in the game
The game is developed by one person.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains blood and violence in hell scenes.

HÜDDAM

It is an open world game that reflects Turkish culture.
It has a structure where you can engage in the act of researching and solving events.
This game, which is in the horror genre, will lead you to tension, fear and adventure while offering atmospheric environments.

name: HUDDAM

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD Ryzen™ 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ rx 580 8 GB or Geforce Gtx 1060 6gb Gddr5
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SOUND
  • Additional Notes: HÜDDAM Unreal® Engine 5 motorunu kullanır.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WINDOWS® 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 or AMD Ryzen™ 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ rx 590 8 GB or Geforce Gtx 1080 6gb Gddr5
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
  • Sound Card: SOUND
  • Additional Notes: HÜDDAM Unreal® Engine 5 motorunu kullanır.

short_description: HÜDDAM is a type of psychological horror blended with Turkish culture.-singleplayer-puzzle-horror-thriller-open world-FPS style it is a game.Requirements as a story and reaching the goal.Find the Patient as a Hodja,solve puzzles,Investigate the Underlying Cause.
